description:
vTiger CRM is the most popular open-source and free customer relationship management (CRM) software that helps businesses manage their sales, support, marketing, and inventory processes. This comprehensive guide will walk you through the step-by-step process of installing vTiger CRM on Ubuntu 22.04, offering you a strong platform to gather customer data in one place, automate […]

The post How to Install vTiger CRM on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install vTiger CRM on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
Fathom is a privacy-focused web analytics software with GDPR compliance and no cookie banners required. In this article, we’ll show you how to install Fathom Privacy-Focused Web Analytics on Ubuntu.

The post How to Install Fathom Privacy-Focused Web Analytics on Ubuntu appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Fathom Privacy-Focused Web Analytics on Ubuntu

description:
Meet Reflector, the Arch Linux tool that optimizes your Pacman experience by selecting the fastest and most up-to-date mirrors. Here’s how to use it.

The post Finding the Most Up-to-Date and Fastest Arch Linux Mirrors appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Finding the Most Up-to-Date and Fastest Arch Linux Mirrors

description:
Object-relational mapping (ORM) is a programming technique for converting data between incompatible type systems using object-oriented programming languages. This creates, in effect, a “virtual object database” that can be used from within the programming language.

The post 6 Best Free and Open Source C# Object-Relational Mapping Software appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 6 Best Free and Open Source C# Object-Relational Mapping Software

description:
System76 introduced the new brand and logotype for the COSMIC desktop environment, with the Alpha version expected in late July.

The post System76 Unveils COSMIC Brand and New Logo appeared first on Linux Today.
title: System76 Unveils COSMIC Brand and New Logo

description:
Ghost is an open-source blogging platform that helps you create a professional-looking blog. In this tutorial, we will explore how to install Ghost CMS using Nginx and MySQL on a server powered by Debian 12.

The post How to Deploy Ghost Blog With Nginx on Debian 12 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Deploy Ghost Blog With Nginx on Debian 12

description:
Highlights of OpenShot 3.2 include support for Blender 4.1 and improved Blender animations, support for the latest FFmpeg 7.0 multimedia framework, experimental support for Java bindings, a new Remove Gap feature to remove unwanted gaps between video clips, adds Effect Sequencing before or after keyframes are applied, and new Retro and Cosmic Dusk themes.

The post OpenShot 3.2 Video Editor Brings Remove Gap Feature, New Themes, and More appeared first on Linux Today.
title: OpenShot 3.2 Video Editor Brings Remove Gap Feature, New Themes, and More
